Driving Impact on Earth and Beyond

Impact Orbit unites strategy, innovation, and technology to help organisations deliver tangible, systemic outcomes across space, sustainability, and emerging technologies.

LEARN MORE

Green Orbit Digital is embedded in a vibrant ecosystem that drives innovation and sustainability. Through partnerships with organisations like DOCK, Space City Leicester, and the Midlands Space Cluster, we support businesses and communities to thrive while embedding sustainable practices.

Engagement with initiatives such as Leicester Startups and Sustainable East Midlands enables us to connect local talent, organisations, and entrepreneurs. By leveraging these networks, we foster collaboration, knowledge-sharing, and impactful projects across space, tech, and climate-focused sectors.

Our Partners & Collaborators

We work closely with these organisations to drive sustainable growth and innovation across the UK space and tech ecosystem.

DOCK Space City Leicester Midlands Space Cluster Leicester Startups Sustainable East Midlands

How We Add Value

  • Connecting clients with innovation networks, accelerators, and startup initiatives.
  • Facilitating partnerships aligned with sustainability and net-zero goals.
  • Sharing expertise in digital marketing and eco-conscious strategies with ecosystem members.
  • Highlighting opportunities for businesses to grow responsibly within regional clusters.
  • Supporting cross-sector collaboration to drive innovation in space, tech, and climate-focused projects.

Join the Green Orbit Ecosystem

Whether you're a startup, established business, or organisation committed to sustainability, we welcome collaboration to foster innovation and impact.

Get Involved
Impact Orbit Creative Group

Impact Orbit Creative Group is a multi-disciplinary consultancy and innovation hub focused on driving sustainable growth, digital transformation, and impact-led strategies in the space and technology sectors. We partner with organisations and startups worldwide to deliver strategic guidance, communications expertise, and frameworks for responsible innovation.
